text: Yuriy Yaroslavovych Mokrytskyi (; born 16 October 1970 in Rava-Ruska) is a former Ukrainian football player. ==Honours== ;Soviet Union *FIFA U-17 World Cup champion: 1987 *UEFA European Under-16 Championship runner-up: 1987 ;Karpaty Lviv *Ukrainian Cup finalist: 1993 ==References== Category:1970 births Category:People from Rava-Ruska Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC SKA-Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Halychyna Drohobych players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Maccabi Ironi Ashdod F.C. players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Vorskla Poltava players Category:FC Vorskla-2 Poltava players Category:FC Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk players Category:FC Oleksandriya players Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:FC Tekhno-Centre Rohatyn players Category:FC Dnipro Cherkasy players Category:Association football defenders
title: Yuriy Mokrytskyi
